stanza.line: What is your substance whereof are youmade
That millions of strange shadows on youtend
Since every one hath every one oneshade
And you but one can every shadowlend
On Helen cheek all art of beauty set
And you in Grecian tires are paintednew
Speak of the spring and foison of theyear
The one doth shadow of your beautyshow
The other as your bounty dothappear
And you in every blessed shape weknow
In all external grace you have somepart
But you like none none you for constantheart
